description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Punch, kick, shoot and smash - in Block Slam, you use your PowerBall and Minigun to destroy all the blocks in each level. Gather Bonuses, avoid hazards and always keep your PowerBall in play - this is 3D block busting action like you've never seen before!
description.short: Punch, kick, shoot and smash - in Block Slam, you use your PowerBall and Minigun to destroy all the blocks in each level. Gather Bonuses, avoid hazards and always keep your PowerBall in play - this is 3D block busting action like you've never seen before!
